TopicTitle: serious show stopper bugs in latest patch.

Articles.Content:
The game file won't save once I launch.    Auto save isn't working either.   No matter what I do, when I quit the game reverts back to being on the launch pad.
Makes the game completely dysfunctional.   Further wheels caused my ship to blow up when retracted on the ground and fast forward is used.
There is also a bug with the structural adapter. It vanishes when you place it.   IF you select the part it is attached to, delete it, and then hit control Z,
it comes back still attached and behaves as expected.
(T)

Edited June 29, 2021 by tswain
spellin

Makes the game completely dysfunctional.   Further wheels caused my ship to blow up when retracted on the ground and fast forward is used.
There is also a bug with the structural adapter. It vanishes when you place it.   IF you select the part it is attached to, delete it, and then hit control Z,
it comes back still attached and behaves as expected.

Well, when I do that, it works just fine.

So obviously we need some more data to be able to help you.

Like logs.
Support thread moved to the support sub.

any mods?

have you tried a fresh copy of the game files?
I logd back into steam and it downloaded some files and the issue was fixed and I can now save again.
